img_above_text:
* The Great Sage's Broken Shell
## Water Curtain Cave
img_below_text:
At the start of Water Curtain Cave, go up the slope and to the cliff's edge. Run and jump across the gap to reach the path slightly below and be able to get behind the waterfall.
![Water Curtain Cave Walkthrough \(3\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fe/Water_Curtain_Cave_Walkthrough_%283%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a scenic view of the Water Curtain Cave, featuring a large waterfall cascading down a rocky cliff surrounded by lush greenery. An arrow in the foreground indicates the path to follow, suggesting the image serves as a visual guide for navigating the cave area in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The preceding and following text instructs players to jump across a gap to reach a path behind the waterfall, highlighting the image's role in aiding players in exploring this section of the game.
